panels.visual: Visual: The wolf bows its great head to Lightsword, gratitude in its now-clear amber eyes. No more purple glow - just a noble, powerful creature. Characters: Lightsword, Dire Wolf
panels.dialogue: (Caption): "The curse was gone. And in its place..."
